about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, CKP Products Ltd engaged in the trading of edible oil, rice, and pulses in India and internationally. The company is involved in buying and selling crude and refined palm oil, sesame oil, rice bran oil, sunflower oil, soyabean oil, olive Oil, ground nut and cotton seed oil and other agro commodities like pulses and rice and supply the same to oil processors, wholesalers, food companies, etc.

In the year 2015, they have acquired a 51% share in the manufacturing unit of Naik Foods Private Ltd and established it as their subsidiary company which is engaged in the manufacture of potato chips, fryums and other namkeen products.

contactDetails.full_address: CKP Products Ltd, 404 4th Floor, Kaveri Complex Behind Holiday Inn, Jagannath Mandir Road Sakinaka

faqs.question: What is the CKP Products IPO?
faqs.answer:
CKP Products IPO is a SME IPO of 1248000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹50 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on April 26, 2017, and closes on April 28, 2017.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in CKP Products IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in CKP Products IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in CKP Products IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in CKP Products IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'CKP Products IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When CKP Products IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The CKP Products IPO opens on April 26, 2017 and closes on April 28, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of CKP Products IPO?
faqs.answer: CKP Products IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for CKP Products IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in CKP Products IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
